name: npm-package-deployer
description: A useful tool to deploy an NPM version via CLI

scripts.pre-deploy: npm run build && npm run clean
scripts.action-build: ncc build action.index.js -o dist && git add ./dist/index.js && git add ./action.index.js && git add ./action.yml && git commit -m "Updating GitHub Action"
scripts.build-and-commit: git add . && rmdir dist /s/q && npm run action-build && git push origin HEAD

author: Dani Tseitlin
